Keywords: Amazon , Black Lantern Corps , Monster , Warrior
Real Name: Diana
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
REVENANT: Wonder Woman starts the game on click #4. // Steal Energy. When she uses it, she may heal past her starting line.
HEWING THE HEARTS OF HEROES: Wonder Woman may start the game with the WW80 #s004 Sword of Athena equipped and, when she is, her critical hits deal penetrating damage.
DEATH: Charge, Flurry. When Wonder Woman uses Flurry and hits with the first attack, after that attack resolves she can move up to 2 squares automatically breaking away before making her second attack.
RISE: STOP. Toughness. // At the end of your turn, heal 1 click.
